trial_type.Description: Which audio type was heard by the subject in this trial.

value.Description:
The code associated with a trial type. NOTE: this is NOT the trigger
    type in EEG annotations but these are separated by 2 triggers in EEG

sample.Description: The sample within the EEG data at which an event occurred.

token.Description:
The file number of the trial type. E.g., for male_high trial 1 you would 
        load 'male001_highf0'.

EEG_trigger_start.Description: The trigger values in the EEG annotations for the event onset.

EEG_trigger_end.Description: The trigger values in the EEG annotations for 20 ms before event offset.

stim_file.Description: The file loaded to play the audio (called 'x' in the hdf5 dictionary)
